item.title: Version 2! This Sleek Sky-High Bar Has Cocktails, Views—and All the Vibes
item.dc:creator: Janet Guan
item.description: Version 2! We’ve partnered with Shangri-La Sydney to showcase why Blu Bar on 36, is one of the best bars in Sydney and the go-to spot for an unforgettable night out. Picture this: An iconic skyline shimmering at golden hour, the gentle clink of cocktail glasses and that low hum of conversation that sets the tone for […]
